responsibilities: Build essential tooling required to interact with the Machine Learning Hub.
Work with a supportive team of talented engineers.
Build and own features end-to-end.
Contribute as an early contributor to the platform shift.
Collaborate across the stack from backend to frontend.
Develop cross-platform tools.
Work collaboratively in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building essential tooling, collaborating across the stack, and developing cross-platform tools. There is no explicit mention of working with language models or fine-tuning them. The responsibilities seem more aligned with software engineering and platform development rather than machine learning model customization.
